named-query.name: Averia.findByIds
named-query.query: select a from Averia a where a.id in ?1

named-query.name: Averia.findNoFacturadasByDni
named-query.query: select a from Averia a where a.vehiculo.cliente.dni = ?1 and a.status = uo.ri.model.types.AveriaStatus.TERMINADA

named-query.name: MedioPago.findByInvoiceId
named-query.query: select m from Factura f join f.averias a join a.vehiculo.cliente c join c.mediosPago m where f.id = ?1

named-query.name: Mecanico.findByDni
named-query.query: select m from Mecanico m where m.dni = ?1

named-query.name: Factura.findByNumber
named-query.query: select f from Factura f where f.numero = ?1
